actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill to rescind budget authority for the Agricultural Stabilization and Conservation Service for the rural clean water program (rescission numbered R87-2) proposed to be rescinded in a special message transmitted to the Congress by the President on January 5, 1987, in accordance with section 1012 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

summary.text: Rescinds budget authority for the Agricultural Stabilization and Conservation Service rural clean water program (R87-2).

titles.title: A bill to rescind budget authority for the Agricultural Stabilization and Conservation Service for the rural clean water program (rescission numbered R87-2) proposed to be rescinded in a special message transmitted to the Congress by the President on January 5, 1987, in accordance with section 1012 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
